name: Canadian Canine Bonfire Jacket
description: A stylish winter jacket for city dogs. The Bonfire Jacket features a responsibly sourced down vest with a knit collar and sleeves for maximum coverage and warmth. It's easy to get on and off thanks to the side-entry design, and is also easily adjusted. An access tab makes it easy to wear this jacket with a harness.Responsibly sourced and traceable down.Side entry design, with full zipper for ease of entry.Knit collar and sleeves.Full coverage.Accessory loop.Adjustable-fit access tab for use with a harness.
